name: Ronaldo: Soccer Clash
description:
Play and Score like Cristiano Ronaldo from the streets of Portugal to Stadiums from around the World!
You’ll play in Lisbon, Manchester, Madrid, and more… in the best real-time multiplayer soccer game ever!

Battle against other futbol players around the world LIVE right now!

Strike and score as you compete in PvP games & tournament to rank up the global Leaderboards.

Collect and customize your soccer avatar with new balls, kits, boots and more.

Download and play Ronaldo Soccer Clash today for FREE!
- Outstanding soccer game 3D graphics and animations
- Rapid PvP real-time gameplay
- Fine-tuned strike system that’s easy to learn but difficult to master
- 40+ Balls to collect and Upgrade
- 500+ Avatar Customization items
- Thousands of live futbol players online waiting to be challenged
- Compete in 6 highly detailed Stadiums and Arenas
- Earn promotion in weekly leagues to win FREE PRIZES
- Earn bags to unlock rewards, collect & upgrade powerful new balls and other futbol goodies

A network connection is required to play.

Don’t miss out on the latest news:
Like Ronaldo Soccer Clash: https://www.facebook.com/RonaldoFootballClash
Like us on Instagram:@MVPSPORTS
Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/ronaldoclash
Support - Are you having problems?

Visit http://mvpsports.life or contact us in game by going to Settings > Help and Support.
Privacy Policy: http://www.mvpsports.life/privacy-policy/

PLEASE NOTE! Ronaldo Soccer Clash is free to download and play, however, some game items can also be purchased for real money. If you do not want to use this feature, please disable in-app purchases in your device's settings.
Ronaldo Soccer Clash is not affiliated with soccer players David Beckham, Lionel Messi, Luis Suarez, Ronaldinho and Neymar. The game is also not affiliated with the English Premier League, FIFA, Major League Soccer, World Cup 2018 or soccer teams Chelsea FC, Liverpool FC and Manchester United (MU).
